title: routes
body: Next.js API routes provide a powerful way to handle backend logic in your application. This blog covers how to set up and use API routes with examples for both the `pages` and `app` directories.

title: Introduction to CSS Animations
body: CSS animations can bring your web pages to life with smooth transitions and effects. Learn the basics of defining animations, keyframes, and applying them to elements in this detailed guide.

title: Building Real-Time Applications with Socket.io
body: Socket.io is a popular library for enabling real-time communication in web applications. This post walks you through setting up Socket.io for real-time chat functionality in your projects.

title: Top 5 UI Libraries for React
body: Choosing the right UI library can streamline your development process. Here we compare top UI libraries like Chakra UI, ShadCN UI, and others, discussing their features and use cases.

title: A Guide to TypeScript Basics
body: TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript that adds static types. This blog introduces TypeScript, explaining basic concepts, type annotations, and how to integrate it into your existing JavaScript projects.

title: Tips for Freelancing Success
body: Freelancing offers flexibility and independence, but it comes with its challenges. Discover essential tips for finding clients, managing projects, and maintaining a successful freelancing career.
